thread.title: Shaq’s mom tries to end the feud with JaVale McGee
thread.title_full: Shaq’s mom tries to end the feud with JaVale McGee

title: Shaq’s mom tries to end the feud with JaVale McGee
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Shaq’s mom tries to end the feud with JaVale McGee "Stop this silliness." Post to Facebook Shaq’s mom tries to end the feud with JaVale McGee "Stop this silliness." Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/shaq-shaquille-oneal-mom-javale-mcgee-beef-warriors-tnt-shaqtin Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Shaq’s mom tries to end the feud with JaVale McGee Andrew Joseph 9:10   
After years of being mocked in Shaquille O'Neal's "Shaqtin' a Fool" segment on Inside the NBA , the Warriors' JaVale McGee had enough. Last week, McGee tweeted at Shaq, which prompted the NBA's most intense war overnight . 
Shaq's mom may have just brought this feud to an end. 
In an interview with The Undefeated , Shaq said that he got a call from his mom, Lucille, who told him to leave McGee alone. Shaq intends on heeding to his mother's wishes. 
Via The Undefeated : 
"No," O'Neal said. "My mama. Just say Shaq's mom called him, told him, 'Stop this silliness. Leave him alone.' So that's the end of the beef. You won't be hearing about it from my side anymore. Mama has spoken." 
Said Lucille O'Neal earlier Saturday evening from her Orlando, Florida, home, "It's not funny anymore, seeing the things they're saying to each other. They need to squash this and move on." 
McGee's mother, Pamela, wasn't as quick to move on, though. She'd like to see Shaq face some discipline from his bosses at Turner Sports and the NBA. 
"He cyberbullied my son. Totally inappropriate. Shaquille needs to lose his job or be suspended. The NBA needs to make a stand." 
In the meantime, Shaq promises that he's done with the McGee beef. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/shaq-shaquille-oneal-mom-javale-mcgee-beef-warriors-tnt-shaqtin Most Popular
